Subskills.name: Holy Velocity
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of chain of holy light.

Subskills.name: Plasma Burst
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chain of holy light.

Subskills.name: God's Altar
Subskills.description: Summon an altar of light unleashing chain of holy light on nearby monsters. Chain of holy light now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Holy Discharge
Subskills.description: Chance to smite monsters with holy lightning on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Divine Divergence
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional chain of holy light on hit.

Subskills.name: Amplifying Prayer
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chain of holy light with each bounce.

Subskills.name: Spellbreak Prayer
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: God's Grasp
Subskills.description: Pull monsters towards the first target on hit unleashing a divine explosion dealing increased damage with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Sacred Steps
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using chain of holy light.

Subskills.name: Lightened Path
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of chain of holy light.

Subskills.name: Light's Embrace
Subskills.description: Chain of holy light heals you for a portion of your maximum life when hitting its last target.

Subskills.name: Recursive Light
Subskills.description: Chain of holy light strikes the same target multiple times if there are no monsters nearby dealing a portion of its damage.

Subskills.name: Echo of Heavens
Subskills.description: Unleash holy bolts towards targets on hit.
